text:
I'll be visiting Berlin from Wed 26th June to Sat 29th, and I was wondering if anyone would be interested in grabbing a beer or going for a lunch or something? Could chat about topics like design tools and AI, creative coding, automated design tools, for example. Also interested in any suggestions on what to do or see!

The generative art summit looked great, but unfortunately it is first on the week after (<https://art-meets-science.io/en/generative-art-summit-berlin/>), same for the creative code meetup (<https://www.meetup.com/creativecodeberlin/>).
